name: .BRTEX File Extension
summary: Learn about .BRTEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game texture file used by select Nintendo Wii games such as Super Smash Bros. Brawl and Mario Kart Wii; similar to the .BRRES package; contains texture data for characters and objects that is referenced for gameplay.

content: NOTE: BRTEX files can be renamed with the "brres" extension and opened as a BRRES file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
